name: BR34K0UT
description:
NOTE: This game is "story driven" and has a progression. It is not as it initially seems.

A quick little "jame" for the Mini Jame Game #16. Play breakout for a highscore as you descend deeper into the buggy madness the game holds (all deliberately programmed in, of course). The game does get unplayable towards the end, but this is intentional. 

Music by Waterflame (https://www.youtube.com/@WaterflameMusic)
